text:
e="preserve">Judith McGrath (21 April 1947 – 21 October 2017) was an Australian actress. She was born in Brisbane, Queensland. She was best known for her television soap roles as Colleen Powell in "Prisoner" (1979–1984) on Network Ten, Bernice Hudson in A Country Practice on Network Seven between 1992 and 1993 and Von Ryan in the medical drama "All Saints" (1998–2009) on Network Seven.
McGrath died on 21 October 2017 at a hospice in Sydney of an aortic aneurysm at the age of 70.
